title: ContextualAwareness
description: Schema for contextual awareness information related to an entity in a semantic event.

entity_type.description: The type of the entity this context refers to (e.g., 'Currency', 'Product', 'Service', 'Other').

entity_gid.description: The Graph UUID of the entity this context refers to. This is a Context Suite specific GID, potentially an Account or any sub-entity.

entity_wid.description: The Wikidata ID (WID) of the entity this context refers to. This is a Context Suite specific WID, potentially an Account or any sub-entity.

context.description: The actual contextual information string (e.g., 'Silfra is an extremely cold pond with a constant temperature of 2Â° celsius').
